snippet: Senior Defense Department officials have begun examining in earnest how the military would respond to automatic reductions.
abstract: Senior Defense Department officials have begun examining in earnest how the military would respond to automatic reductions.
lead_paragraph: After months of refusing to plan for how the Pentagon budget could or should be trimmed further, senior Defense Department officials have begun examining in earnest how the military would respond to automatic spending reductions if a budget deal eludes President Obama and Congress past the end of the year.

headline.main: Pentagon Begins to Plan for Budget Cuts

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
